  • Changements

    fluidPage_dsfr

    fluidPage_dsfr.Rd

    fluidPage_dsfr

    fluidPage_dsfr(
  ...,
  header = NULL,
  title = NULL,
  footer = NULL,
  theme = NULL,
  lang = NULL
)

    Arguments

    ...

    element a inclure dans la page

    header

    l entete de la page (voir header_dsfr())

    title

    titre de la page

    footer

    contenu du pied de page (voir footer_dsfr())

    theme

    pas implemente

    lang

    pas implemente

    Valeur de retour

    html

    Examples

    if (interactive()) {

  library(shiny)
  my_page <- fluidPage_dsfr(
    header = header_dsfr(
      intitule = c("Prefet", "de", "Bretagne")
    ),
    title = "Gouv",
    htmltools::div("test")
  )

  shiny::shinyApp(
    my_page,
    server = function(input, output) {}
  )
}
